description: A month-long campaign dedicated to promoting road safety awareness. The event is also referred to as 'सड़क सुरक्षा अभियान 2026' (Road Safety Campaign 2026) with the slogan 'भारत करे, सुरक्षित चले' (India walks, walks safely).
raw_text: NATIONAL ROAD SAFETY MONTH, 2026 1-31 January सड़क सुरक्षा अभियान 2026 भारत करे, सुरक्षित चले www.nsrit.edu.in ROAD SAFETY PLEASE SLOW DOWN THINK ROAD SAFETY LEFT STOP
